00019 import java.util.ArrayList;

00035 public class Inputs 
00036 {
00037 
00041     static private Node[] NodeList;
00042     
00046     static private Edge[] EdgeList;
00047    
00051     private ArrayList<Vehicle> vehiclesList;
00052     
00058     public Inputs(int n) 
00059     {
00060         NodeList = new Node[n];
00061         EdgeList = new Edge[(n - 1) * (n - 2) / 2]; // The depot is not considered
00062         vehiclesList=new ArrayList<Vehicle>();
00063     }
00064 
00070     public Node[] getNodeList() 
00071     {
00072         return NodeList;
00073     }
00074 
00080     public void setNodeList(Node[] NodeList) 
00081     {
00082         this.NodeList = NodeList;
00083     }
00084 
00085     public static void setEdgeList(Edge[] EdgeList) 
00086     {
00087         Inputs.EdgeList = EdgeList;
00088     }
00089 
00095     public Edge[] getEdgeList()
00096     {
00097         return EdgeList;
00098     }
00099 
00107     public void setNode(int i, Node node) 
00108     {
00109         NodeList[i] = node;
00110     }
00111 
00119     public void sedEdge(int i, Edge edge) 
00120     {
00121         EdgeList[i] = edge;
00122     }
00123 
00129     public ArrayList<Vehicle> getVehiclesList() 
00130     {
00131         return vehiclesList;
00132     }
00133 
00139     public void setVehicle(Vehicle v)
00140     {
00141         vehiclesList.add(v);
00142     }
00143 
00151     public Vehicle getVehicle(int index)
00152     {
00153         return vehiclesList.get(index);
00154     }
00155 
00159     public void fillEdgeList() 
00160     {
00161         int n = 0;
00162         for (int i = 1; i < NodeList.length - 1; i++) // node 0 is the depot
00163         {
00164             for (int j = i + 1; j < NodeList.length; j++) 
00165             {
00166                 Node iNode = NodeList[i];
00167                 Node jNode = NodeList[j];
00168                 Edge ijEdge = new Edge(iNode, jNode);
00169                 EdgeList[n] = ijEdge;
00170                 n++;
00171             }
00172         }
00173     }
00174     
00175 }
